name: jQuery-rowClick
body:
## Description Expands the clickable area to an entire table row if that row contains a link. Open example.html for example usage. ## Required HTML
Test Cell 1 Test Cell 2 Test Cell 3
## Required JavaScript $('table').rowClick(); ## Links * [Online Demo](http://jsfiddle.net/WpSG5/) * [Screenshots](https://sites.google.com/site/tpopsjqueryplugins/rowclick/screenshots)
tagline: Expands the clickable area to an entire table row if that row contains a link.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
